mapper.sql: id, execution_id, step_id, compensate_component, status, error_message, compensated_at, operator, operation_type, created_at
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saga_compensation_log ( execution_id, step_id, compensate_component, status, error_message, compensated_at, operator, operation_type, created_at ) VALUES
(#{item.executionId}, #{item.stepId}, #{item.compensateComponent}, #{item.status}, #{item.errorMessage}, #{item.compensatedAt}, #{item.operator}, #{item.operationType}, #{item.createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM saga_compensation_log WHERE execution_id = #{executionId} ORDER BY compensated_at ASC
SELECT FROM saga_compensation_log WHERE execution_id = #{executionId} AND step_id = #{stepId} ORDER BY compensated_at ASC
SELECT FROM saga_compensation_log WHERE compensated_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY compensated_at DESC
SELECT FROM saga_compensation_log WHERE operator = #{operator} ORDER BY compensated_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM saga_compensation_log WHERE execution_id = #{executionId} AND status = 'FAILED'
